
\section{Awards, Honors and Grants}

\denseouterlist{

\entrymid[\textbullet]
{\textbf{NISOD award}}{ }
{The NISOD Excellence Awards were established in 1991 to provide NISOD-member colleges with an opportunity to recognize individuals doing extraordinary work on their campuses.}

\entrymid[\textbullet]
{\textbf{OER Grant}}{ }
{Winner of several OER grants designed to encourage Open Educational Resources to be created and shared as widely as possible to intructors and students}
